metadata.description: A curated dataset representing the network of influence surrounding the State Financial Officers Foundation (SFOF).

nodes.name: State Financial Officers Foundation (SFOF)
nodes.description: Central organization coordinating the anti-ESG agenda among state financial officers. Revenue grew from $940k (2021) to $2.9M (2023).

nodes.name: Derek Kreifels
nodes.description: Co-founder and former CEO of SFOF. Founder of Prospr Aligned, a for-profit anti-ESG consultancy.

nodes.name: DonorsTrust
nodes.description: The 'dark money ATM' of the political right. Major funder of the entire anti-ESG ecosystem, anonymizing donors.

nodes.name: ALEC
nodes.description: Develops and disseminates model anti-ESG legislation (e.g., 'Eliminate Political Boycotts Act'). Shares leadership with SFOF.

nodes.name: Consumers' Research
nodes.description: Key operational partner and major funder of SFOF. Runs aggressive public campaigns against 'woke' companies.

nodes.name: Federated Hermes
nodes.description: Major SFOF sponsor. Beneficiary of divestment actions by SFOF members.

nodes.name: Curtis Loftis
nodes.description: South Carolina Treasurer. Central figure in the SEC 'pay-to-play' complaint regarding BlackRock divestment.

edges.details: Moved state funds divested from BlackRock to Federated Hermes. (Alleged Pay-to-Play).
